author: cbs8
title: Arc Thrift Stores Has Largest Costume Selection for The Walking Dead Attending Denvers Zombie Crawl
text:
Arc has Colorado’s largest selection of build-your-own zombie costumes.
Denver, CO (PRWEB) October 06, 2015
Any zombie who’s any zombie is getting a costume at Arc Thrift Stores for this year’s Zombie Crawl!
This year’s Zombie Crawl promises to be the largest in history – with over 40,000 “undead” expected to descend on Denver’s Skyline Park on October 17th. A quick visit to one of Colorado’s 23 Arc Thrift Stores makes looking gruesome and gory simple and affordable.
From makeup to clothing to masks, wigs, and more, Arc has Colorado’s largest selection of build-your-own zombie costumes. (Not to mention everything to decorate a home and to create all sorts of other costumes for kids and adults alike!)
Arc Thrift Stores is one of the event’s exclusive sponsors.
All items are 50 percent off on Saturdays (excluding current color tags and green tags).
Killer Deals wristbands -- for half-off, two-for-one, and other discounts around Denver on the day of the Crawl -- are available for purchase for $25 at all ARC Thrift Stores locations.
Visit a local Arc Thrift Store today! Click here for locations. http://www.arcthrift.org/location/store-locations-2.html?gclidG87TrjcgCFYNFaQodrosMkA
The Zombie Party is free and open to Halloween fans of all ages. Click here for more information. http://eyeheartbrains.com/
About Arc Thrift Stores: Arc Thrift Stores http://www.arcthrift.org operates 23 thrift stores and 15 “donation stations” throughout Colorado. Store operations provide funding to Arc Chapters, which in turn provide advocacy for people with intellectual and developmental disabilities. Arc Thrift Stores is one of the largest employers of individuals with intellectual and developmental disabilities in the state of Colorado.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12989189.htm
